sorcer.core.context
Interface ContextManagement

All Known Subinterfaces:
RemoteContextManagement
All Known Implementing Classes:
ContextManagementAdapter, DatabaseProvider, DataSpaceProvider, ExertMonitor, RemoteLoggerManager, ServiceCataloger, ServiceJobber, ServiceProvider, ServiceSpacer, ServiceTasker
public interface ContextManagement

Context Management provides methods for managing contexts over the network. The ContextManagement interface is implemented by providers to allow for remote calls to obtain, update and delete contexts.

Field Summary
static String CONTEXT_FILENAME
           
static String CONTEXT_REQUEST_PATH

 String[] currentContextList(String interfaceName)
          Gets the list of methods of the defined interface which have contexts defined on in the dataContext storage
 boolean deleteContext(String interfaceName, String methodName)
          Deletes a dataContext from the data store, the data store is then updated so that future requests are handled properly.
 Context getContext()
          Returns the default dataContext by the defining provider.
 String getContextScript()
          Returns the default dataContext script by the defining provider.
 Context getMethodContext(String interfaceName, String methodName)
          Obtains the dataContext from data storage used to hold the contexts.
 String getMethodContextScript(String interfaceName, String methodName)
          Returns the dataContext script or its URL.
 boolean saveMethodContext(String interfaceName, String methodName, Context theContext)
          Saves the dataContext to the local data store and updates the file used for permanent storage

getContext

                   throws RemoteException
Returns the default dataContext by the defining provider.

Throws:

getContextScript

                        throws RemoteException
Returns the default dataContext script by the defining provider.

Throws:

getMethodContext

Context getMethodContext(String interfaceName,
                         String methodName)
                         throws RemoteException
Obtains the dataContext from data storage used to hold the contexts. Returns an empty dataContext in the event the requested one is not found.

Parameters:
interfaceName - String of the interface name the method is defined on
methodName - Name of the method the dataContext is saved as
Returns:
Context representing the methodName
Throws:
RemoteException

getMethodContextScript

String getMethodContextScript(String interfaceName,
                              String methodName)
                              throws RemoteException
Returns the dataContext script or its URL.

Parameters:
interfaceName - String of the interface name the method is defined on
methodName - Name of the method the dataContext is saved as
Returns:
String representing the methodName
Throws:
RemoteException

saveMethodContext

boolean saveMethodContext(String interfaceName,
                          String methodName,
                          Context theContext)
                          throws RemoteException
Saves the dataContext to the local data store and updates the file used for permanent storage

Parameters:
interfaceName - String of the interface name the method is defined on
methodName - Name of the method the dataContext is saved as
theContext - Context to be saved
Returns:
Boolean indicating if the dataContext was stored properly
Throws:
RemoteException

currentContextList

String[] currentContextList(String interfaceName)
                            throws RemoteException
Gets the list of methods of the defined interface which have contexts defined on in the dataContext storage

Parameters:
interfaceName - String of the interface to lookup
Returns:
String array of the methods which have a dataContext defined
Throws:
RemoteException

deleteContext

boolean deleteContext(String interfaceName,
                      String methodName)
                      throws RemoteException
Deletes a dataContext from the data store, the data store is then updated so that future requests are handled properly.

Parameters:
interfaceName - String showing which interface the method is defined for
methodName - String of the method name to remove the dataContext for
Returns:
boolean indicating if the dataContext has been deleted successfully
Throws:
RemoteException
